jacket1.name: The Dropzone Jacket
jacket1.description: A structured, olive military zip-up with shoulder straps and dual chest pockets, tailored just enough to keep it clean.

jacket2.name: The Moss Circuit Bomber
jacket2.description: Padded olive-green shell with a soft inner lining and utility feel, effortlessly insulated for city wind or mountain edge.

jacket3.name: The Driftwood Bomber
jacket3.description: Shearling-lined suede jacket in a wind-aged tan that feels broken-in from the first wear, offering equal parts durability and cafÃ©-side charm.

jacket4.name: The Black Signal Jacket
jacket4.description: Zip-up bomber in matte jet black, with a clean chest seam and a high collar that frames the face while cutting the wind.

backpack1.name: The Signalpack Ruck
backpack1.description: A camo-pattern tactical backpack with modular pouches, clip locks, and a boxy silhouette built for carry and command.

backpack2.name: The Blackstack Modular Pack
backpack2.description: A structured roll-top backpack with a minimalist silhouette, full-zip side access, and water-resistant build.

backpack3.name: The Nomadâ€™s Grid Pack
backpack3.description: Blends corduroy, canvas, and vegan leather into a city-ready patchwork with just enough rebellion.

backpack4.name: The Ashloop Daypack
backpack4.description: Structured dual-tone canvas backpack with leather loop accents and hidden zippers, compact but statement-ready.

pants1.name: The Echo Grid Pants
pants1.description: Slate-grey cargos with a slim taper, minimalist seams, and reinforced knees made for wear, not just style.

pants2.name: The Patcher Utility Joggers
pants2.description: Midnight navy with cargo details, mission-inspired patchwork, and waxed brown shin guards for added grit.

pants3.name: The Shadow Ridge Cargo Tapers
pants3.description: Technical greeny, buggy cargos cut slim through the ankle with utility pockets and flexible seams, built to move but styled to stay sharp.

pants4.name: The Studio Fade Denim
pants4.description: Is a pair of dark-washed jeans with a subtle fade and a soft taper, cuffed for movement and polish.
